channel.title: [delta]Please help with Moster strength[delta]
channel.description:
Hello i know im back 2nd time today...god im a noob for some reason today. anyway, any help on the madder of making a monster hit higher without making its combat level too high. (otherwise increasing its strength) i know i have to do it within the 2 files: client.java and npchandler.java but i foget the code. i know i have to change the hit coudl someone please ive me code for doing this in both files. and i only want to do this too one monster. and orc to be exact. npc code = 71
any help appriciated
thanks, Buddy
